include-after-body.text:
<script>
    // --- 1. DATA (Shortened for brevity) ---
    // Note: 'offset' is strictly visual position on the canvas.

    const statesData = [
            { abbr: "DE", full: "Delaware" },        // 1st: Dec 7, 1787
            { abbr: "PA", full: "Pennsylvania" },    // 2nd: Dec 12, 1787
            { abbr: "NJ", full: "New Jersey" },      // 3rd: Dec 18, 1787
            { abbr: "GA", full: "Georgia" },         // 4th: Jan 2, 1788
            { abbr: "CT", full: "Connecticut" },     // 5th: Jan 9, 1788
            { abbr: "MA", full: "Massachusetts" },   // 6th: Feb 6, 1788
            { abbr: "MD", full: "Maryland" },        // 7th: Apr 28, 1788
            { abbr: "SC", full: "South Carolina" },  // 8th: May 23, 1788
            { abbr: "NH", full: "New Hampshire" },   // 9th: June 21, 1788
            { abbr: "VA", full: "Virginia" },        // 10th: June 25, 1788
            { abbr: "NY", full: "New York" },        // 11th: July 26, 1788
            { abbr: "NC", full: "North Carolina" },  // 12th: Nov 21, 1789
            { abbr: "RI", full: "Rhode Island" }     // 13th: May 29, 1790
        ];
    const historyEvents = [
                    {
                        title: "",
                        date: "January 1, 1783",
                        type: "small",
                        offset: 2,
                        description: "",
                        involved: [],
                        notes: {}
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Mount Vernon Conference",
                        date: "March 28, 1785",
                        type: "small",
                        offset: 2,
                        description: "Delegates from Maryland and Virginia meet at George Washington's home to address navigational rights, agreeing to the Mount Vernon Compact.",
                        involved: ["Virginia", "Maryland"],
                        notes: {
                            "Virginia": "Represented by George Mason and Alexander Henderson.",
                            "Maryland": "Ratified the compact to regulate the Chesapeake Bay."
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "The Annapolis Convention",
                        date: "Sept 14, 1786",
                        type: "small",
                        offset: 8,
                        description: "Delegates from five states meet to discuss trade barriers. They issue a report requesting a convention in Philadelphia the following May.",
                        involved: ["New York", "New Jersey", "Pennsylvania", "Delaware", "Virginia"],
                        notes: {
                            "New York": "Hamilton pushes for a convention to amend the Articles.",
                            "Delaware": "One of only five states to arrive in time."
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Convention Convenes",
                        date: "May 25, 1787",
                        type: "large",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/da/Independence_Hall_Assembly_Room.jpg/1280px-Independence_Hall_Assembly_Room.jpg",
                        bgImage: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8b/Independence_Hall_Philadelphia_2017.jpg/1920px-Independence_Hall_Philadelphia_2017.jpg",
                        offset: 15,
                        description: "A quorum is finally reached at the Pennsylvania State House. George Washington is elected president of the convention.",
                        involved: ["All"],
                        notes: { "Virginia": "Washington's election lends immense legitimacy to the gathering." }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "The Great Compromise",
                        date: "July 16, 1787",
                        type: "medium",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/5/58/Roger_Sherman.jpg/480px-Roger_Sherman.jpg",
                        offset: 25,
                        description: "The convention adopts the Connecticut Compromise (5–4–1): House by population, Senate by state equality.",
                        involved: ["Connecticut", "Pennsylvania", "Delaware", "Maryland", "North Carolina"],
                        notes: { "Connecticut": "Roger Sherman's plan saves the convention from collapse." }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Signing the Constitution",
                        date: "Sept 17, 1787",
                        type: "large",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0d/Christy_Scene_at_the_Signing_of_the_Constitution_of_the_United_States.jpg/640px-Christy_Scene_at_the_Signing_of_the_Constitution_of_the_United_States.jpg",
                        bgImage: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/9/98/Howard_Chandler_Christy_-_Scene_at_the_Signing_of_the_Constitution_of_the_United_States_-_Google_Art_Project.jpg",
                        offset: 35,
                        description: "39 delegates sign the document. Three present (Randolph, Mason, Gerry) decline. Franklin notes the 'Rising Sun'.",
                        involved: ["All"],
                        notes: { "Pennsylvania": "Benjamin Franklin weeps with joy." }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "First Ratifications",
                        date: "Dec 1787",
                        type: "medium",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b5/Seal_of_Delaware.svg/640px-Seal_of_Delaware.svg.png",
                        offset: 40,
                        description: "The ratification process begins. Delaware is first (30–0), followed by Pennsylvania (46–23) and New Jersey (38–0).",
                        involved: ["Delaware", "Pennsylvania", "New Jersey"],
                        notes: {
                            "Delaware": "The first state to ratify (Unanimous 30–0).",
                            "Pennsylvania": "Ratifies 46–23 despite Anti-Federalist dissent.",
                            "New Jersey": "Ratifies unanimously (38–0)."
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Georgia & Connecticut",
                        date: "Jan 1788",
                        type: "small",
                        offset: 45,
                        description: "Momentum continues as Georgia (26–0) and Connecticut (128–40) join the Union.",
                        involved: ["Georgia", "Connecticut"],
                        notes: {
                            "Georgia": "Unanimous ratification (26–0).",
                            "Connecticut": "Strong support (128–40)."
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Massachusetts Compromise",
                        date: "Feb 6, 1788",
                        type: "medium",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f2/Elbridge_Gerry.jpg/480px-Elbridge_Gerry.jpg",
                        offset: 50,
                        description: "Massachusetts ratifies (187–168) but demands nineteen alterations, setting the precedent for a Bill of Rights.",
                        involved: ["Massachusetts"],
                        notes: { "Massachusetts": "A tight vote (187–168) secured by promising amendments." }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Spring Ratifications",
                        date: "Apr-May 1788",
                        type: "small",
                        offset: 55,
                        description: "Maryland (63–11) and South Carolina (149–73) ratify. Rhode Island voters reject the constitution in a referendum.",
                        involved: ["Maryland", "South Carolina", "Rhode Island"],
                        notes: {
                            "Maryland": "Ratifies 63–11.",
                            "Rhode Island": "Voters overwhelmingly reject it (2,708–237)."
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Constitution Established",
                        date: "June 21, 1788",
                        type: "medium",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/64/New_Hampshire_population_map_1790.jpg/618px-New_Hampshire_population_map_1790.jpg",
                        offset: 60,
                        description: "New Hampshire becomes the 9th state to ratify (57–47), officially establishing the Constitution under Article VII.",
                        involved: ["New Hampshire"],
                        notes: { "New Hampshire": "The 9th and deciding vote (57–47)." }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Virginia & New York",
                        date: "Summer 1788",
                        type: "medium",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/07/Patrick_henry.JPG/480px-Patrick_henry.JPG",
                        offset: 65,
                        description: "The largest states finally sign on. Virginia (89–79) and New York (30–27) ratify by narrow margins.",
                        involved: ["Virginia", "New York"],
                        notes: {
                            "Virginia": "Ratifies 89–79; suggests 20 amendments.",
                            "New York": "Ratifies 30–27; suggests 33 amendments."
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Washington Inaugurated",
                        date: "April 30, 1789",
                        type: "large",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b6/Gilbert_Stuart_Williamstown_Portrait_of_George_Washington.jpg/480px-Gilbert_Stuart_Williamstown_Portrait_of_George_Washington.jpg",
                        bgImage: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/96/Federal_Hall_National_Memorial_2016.jpg/1920px-Federal_Hall_National_Memorial_2016.jpg",
                        offset: 80,
                        description: "George Washington is sworn in at Federal Hall, NYC, after being unanimously elected by the Electoral College.",
                        involved: ["All"],
                        notes: { "New York": "Hosted the first capital at Federal Hall." }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Bill of Rights Proposed",
                        date: "Sept 25, 1789",
                        type: "small",
                        offset: 85,
                        description: "Congress approves twelve articles of amendment and sends them to the states. Ten will eventually become the Bill of Rights.",
                        involved: ["All"],
                        notes: { "Virginia": "Provided the model for many rights." }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "North Carolina Joins",
                        date: "Nov 21, 1789",
                        type: "small",
                        offset: 90,
                        description: "After initially rejecting it, North Carolina ratifies the Constitution (194–77) at a second convention.",
                        involved: ["North Carolina"],
                        notes: { "North Carolina": "Ratifies 194–77 on the second attempt." }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Rhode Island Joins",
                        date: "May 29, 1790",
                        type: "medium",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Flag_of_Rhode_Island.svg/640px-Flag_of_Rhode_Island.svg.png",
                        offset: 98,
                        description: "Rhode Island becomes the last of the original 13 states to ratify (34–32), completing the Union.",
                        involved: ["Rhode Island"],
                        notes: { "Rhode Island": "Ratifies by the narrowest margin (34–32)." }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "",
                        date: "January 1, 1792",
                        type: "small",
                        offset: 2,
                        description: "",
                        involved: [],
                        notes: {}
                    },
                ];
    // --- 2. SETUP DOM ---
    const sidebar = document.getElementById('sidebar');
    const linesContainer = document.getElementById('lines-container');
    const globalContainer = document.getElementById('global-events-container');
    const labelsContainer = document.getElementById('labels-container');
    const timelineWidth = document.getElementById('timeline-canvas').clientWidth;

    // Dynamic Row Height based on screen height to ensure they fit without vertical scroll
    // On mobile we might want them tighter.
    const rowHeight = "calc((100vh - 3.5rem) / 13)"; // 3.5rem is header height approx

    // Build Grid
    statesData.forEach((state) => {
        // LABEL Logic
        const label = document.createElement('div');
        // We use a CSS class to toggle content based on media query or JS,
        // but simpler here: we put both in spans and hide one with CSS utility classes
        label.className = "w-full flex items-center justify-center md:justify-start md:px-4 font-serif-1700 text-sm md:text-lg text-slate-700 font-semibold border-b border-amber-900/10 transition-colors duration-300";
        label.style.height = rowHeight;
        label.id = `label-${state.full.replace(/\s/g, '')}`;

        // Mobile Abbr (visible block, hidden md)
        const abbrSpan = document.createElement('span');
        abbrSpan.className = "md:hidden";
        abbrSpan.innerText = state.abbr;

        // Desktop Full (hidden, visible md block)
        const fullSpan = document.createElement('span');
        fullSpan.className = "hidden md:block truncate";
        fullSpan.innerText = state.full;

        label.appendChild(abbrSpan);
        label.appendChild(fullSpan);
        sidebar.appendChild(label);

        // LINE Logic
        const lineRow = document.createElement('div');
        lineRow.className = "state-line w-full relative";
        lineRow.style.height = rowHeight;
        lineRow.id = `line-${state.full.replace(/\s/g, '')}`;
        linesContainer.appendChild(lineRow);
    });

    // Build Markers
    historyEvents.forEach((evt, evtIndex) => {
        const pxPos = (evt.offset / 100) * timelineWidth;
        const isUnionEvent = evt.involved.includes("All");

        // Wall Label
        const wallLabel = document.createElement('div');
        wallLabel.className = 'wall-label';
        wallLabel.innerText = evt.title;
        wallLabel.style.left = `${pxPos}px`;
        wallLabel.id = `wall-label-${evtIndex}`;
        labelsContainer.appendChild(wallLabel);

        if (isUnionEvent) {
            const unionLine = document.createElement('div');
            unionLine.className = 'union-line';
            unionLine.style.left = `${pxPos}px`;
            globalContainer.appendChild(unionLine);
        } else {
            evt.involved.forEach(stateName => {
                const cleanName = stateName.replace(/\s/g, '');
                const line = document.getElementById(`line-${cleanName}`);

                const marker = document.createElement('div');
                marker.className = `marker-diamond`;
                marker.style.left = `${pxPos}px`;
                // Center marker vertically in dynamic row height
                marker.style.top = "50%";
                marker.style.marginTop = "-7px"; // Half of 14px height
                marker.dataset.evtIndex = evtIndex;

                line.appendChild(marker);
            });
        }
    });

    // --- 3. LOGIC ---
    const scroller = document.getElementById('scroller');
    const cinematicBg = document.getElementById('cinematic-bg');

    const mainCard = document.getElementById('main-card');
    const cardImgWrapper = document.getElementById('card-img-wrapper');
    const cardImg = document.getElementById('card-img');
    const cardTitle = document.getElementById('card-title');
    const cardDate = document.getElementById('card-date');
    const cardType = document.getElementById('card-type');
    const cardDesc = document.getElementById('card-desc');

    function updateView() {
        const scrollLeft = scroller.scrollLeft;
        const containerW = scroller.clientWidth;
        const playhead = scrollLeft + (containerW / 2);

        let activeEvent = null;
        let minDistance = Infinity;

        // Detect event
        historyEvents.forEach((evt, idx) => {
            const evtPos = (evt.offset / 100) * timelineWidth;
            const dist = Math.abs(playhead - evtPos);
            // Detection range needs to be tighter on mobile or it jumps too fast
            const range = (window.innerWidth < 768) ? 150 : 350;

            if (dist < range) {
                if (dist < minDistance) {
                    minDistance = dist;
                    activeEvent = evt;
                }
            }
            // Reset labels
            document.getElementById(`wall-label-${idx}`).classList.remove('active');
        });

        // Reset Visuals
        document.querySelectorAll('.state-line').forEach(el => el.classList.remove('active'));
        document.querySelectorAll('[id^="label-"]').forEach(el => {
            el.classList.remove('text-black', 'font-bold', 'bg-red-50/50');
            el.classList.add('text-slate-700');
        });
        document.querySelectorAll('.marker-diamond').forEach(el => el.classList.remove('marker-visible'));

        if (activeEvent) {
            // Label
            const evtIndex = historyEvents.indexOf(activeEvent);
            document.getElementById(`wall-label-${evtIndex}`).classList.add('active');

            // Card Content
            mainCard.classList.add('card-visible'); // Slide up
            cardTitle.innerText = activeEvent.title;
            cardDate.innerText = activeEvent.date;
            cardDesc.innerText = activeEvent.description;
            cardType.innerText = activeEvent.type.toUpperCase();

            // Image Logic (Only Desktop actually sees the wrapper, but logic remains)
            if (activeEvent.type !== 'small') {
                cardImgWrapper.classList.add('has-image');
                cardImg.src = activeEvent.image;
            } else {
                cardImgWrapper.classList.remove('has-image');
            }

            // BG Logic (Large events)
            if (activeEvent.type === 'large') {
                cinematicBg.style.backgroundImage = `url('${activeEvent.bgImage}')`;
                cinematicBg.style.opacity = '1';
            } else {
                cinematicBg.style.opacity = '0';
            }

            // Highlighting
            const isUnion = activeEvent.involved.includes("All");
            if (!isUnion) {
                activeEvent.involved.forEach(name => {
                    const clean = name.replace(/\s/g, '');
                    const line = document.getElementById(`line-${clean}`);
                    if(line) line.classList.add('active');

                    const lbl = document.getElementById(`label-${clean}`);
                    if(lbl) {
                        lbl.classList.remove('text-slate-700');
                        lbl.classList.add('text-black', 'font-bold', 'bg-red-50/50');
                    }

                    const marker = document.getElementById(`line-${clean}`).querySelector(`div[data-evt-index="${evtIndex}"]`);
                    if(marker) marker.classList.add('marker-visible');
                });
            }
        } else {
            mainCard.classList.remove('card-visible'); // Slide down
            cinematicBg.style.opacity = '0';
        }
    }

    scroller.addEventListener('scroll', () => requestAnimationFrame(updateView));
    updateView();
</script>

The Road to the Constitution

Description.

                    {

                        date: "May 25, 1787",
                        type: "large",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/d/da/Independence_Hall_Assembly_Room.jpg/1280px-Independence_Hall_Assembly_Room.jpg",
                        bgImage: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8b/Independence_Hall_Philadelphia_2017.jpg/1920px-Independence_Hall_Philadelphia_2017.jpg",

                            "Rhode Island": "Voters overwhelmingly reject it (2,708–237)."
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Constitution Established",
                        date: "June 21, 1788",
                        type: "medium",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/6/64/New_Hampshire_population_map_1790.jpg/618px-New_Hampshire_population_map_1790.jpg",
                        offset: 60,
                        description: "New Hampshire becomes the 9th state to ratify (57–47), officially establishing the Constitution under Article VII.",
                        involved: ["New Hampshire"],
                        notes: { "New Hampshire": "The 9th and deciding vote (57–47)." }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Virginia & New York",
                        date: "Summer 1788",
                        type: "medium",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/07/Patrick_henry.JPG/480px-Patrick_henry.JPG",
                        offset: 65,
                        description: "The largest states finally sign on. Virginia (89–79) and New York (30–27) ratify by narrow margins.",
                        involved: ["Virginia", "New York"],
                        notes: {
                            "Virginia": "Ratifies 89–79; suggests 20 amendments.",
                            "New York": "Ratifies 30–27; suggests 33 amendments."
                        }
                    },
                    {

                        date: "April 30, 1789",
                        type: "large",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/b/b6/Gilbert_Stuart_Williamstown_Portrait_of_George_Washington.jpg/480px-Gilbert_Stuart_Williamstown_Portrait_of_George_Washington.jpg",
                        bgImage: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/9/96/Federal_Hall_National_Memorial_2016.jpg/1920px-Federal_Hall_National_Memorial_2016.jpg",
                        offset: 80,
                        description: "George Washington is sworn in at Federal Hall, NYC, after being unanimously elected by the Electoral College.",
                        involved: ["All"],
                        notes: { "New York": "Hosted the first capital at Federal Hall." }

                    {
                        title: "Bill of Rights Proposed",
                        date: "Sept 25, 1789",
                        type: "small",
                        offset: 85,
                        description: "Congress approves twelve articles of amendment and sends them to the states. Ten will eventually become the Bill of Rights.",
                        involved: ["All"],
                        notes: { "Virginia": "Provided the model for many rights." }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "North Carolina Joins",
                        date: "Nov 21, 1789",
                        type: "small",
                        offset: 90,
                        description: "After initially rejecting it, North Carolina ratifies the Constitution (194–77) at a second convention.",
                        involved: ["North Carolina"],
                        notes: { "North Carolina": "Ratifies 194–77 on the second attempt." }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "Rhode Island Joins",
                        date: "May 29, 1790",
                        type: "medium",
                        image: "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/f/f3/Flag_of_Rhode_Island.svg/640px-Flag_of_Rhode_Island.svg.png",
                        offset: 98,
                        description: "Rhode Island becomes the last of the original 13 states to ratify (34–32), completing the Union.",
                        involved: ["Rhode Island"],
                        notes: { "Rhode Island": "Ratifies by the narrowest margin (34–32)." }
                    },
                    {
                        title: "",
                        date: "January 1, 1792",
                        type: "small",
                        offset: 2,
                        description: "",
                        involved: [],
                        notes: {}
                    },
                ];
    // --- 2. SETUP DOM ---
    const sidebar = document.getElementById('sidebar');
    const linesContainer = document.getElementById('lines-container');
    const globalContainer = document.getElementById('global-events-container');
    const labelsContainer = document.getElementById('labels-container');
    const timelineWidth = document.getElementById('timeline-canvas').clientWidth;

    // Dynamic Row Height based on screen height to ensure they fit without vertical scroll
    // On mobile we might want them tighter.
    const rowHeight = "calc((100vh - 3.5rem) / 13)"; // 3.5rem is header height approx

    // Build Grid
    statesData.forEach((state) => {
        // LABEL Logic
        const label = document.createElement('div');
        // We use a CSS class to toggle content based on media query or JS,
        // but simpler here: we put both in spans and hide one with CSS utility classes
        label.className = "w-full flex items-center justify-center md:justify-start md:px-4 font-serif-1700 text-sm md:text-lg text-slate-700 font-semibold border-b border-amber-900/10 transition-colors duration-300";
        label.style.height = rowHeight;
        label.id = `label-${state.full.replace(/\s/g, '')}`;

        // Mobile Abbr (visible block, hidden md)
        const abbrSpan = document.createElement('span');
        abbrSpan.className = "md:hidden";
        abbrSpan.innerText = state.abbr;

        // Desktop Full (hidden, visible md block)
        const fullSpan = document.createElement('span');
        fullSpan.className = "hidden md:block truncate";
        fullSpan.innerText = state.full;

        label.appendChild(abbrSpan);
        label.appendChild(fullSpan);
        sidebar.appendChild(label);

        // LINE Logic
        const lineRow = document.createElement('div');
        lineRow.className = "state-line w-full relative";
        lineRow.style.height = rowHeight;
        lineRow.id = `line-${state.full.replace(/\s/g, '')}`;
        linesContainer.appendChild(lineRow);
    });

    // Build Markers
    historyEvents.forEach((evt, evtIndex) => {
        const pxPos = (evt.offset / 100) * timelineWidth;
        const isUnionEvent = evt.involved.includes("All");

        // Wall Label
        const wallLabel = document.createElement('div');
        wallLabel.className = 'wall-label';
        wallLabel.innerText = evt.title;
        wallLabel.style.left = `${pxPos}px`;
        wallLabel.id = `wall-label-${evtIndex}`;
        labelsContainer.appendChild(wallLabel);

        if (isUnionEvent) {
            const unionLine = document.createElement('div');
            unionLine.className = 'union-line';
            unionLine.style.left = `${pxPos}px`;
            globalContainer.appendChild(unionLine);
        } else {
            evt.involved.forEach(stateName => {
                const cleanName = stateName.replace(/\s/g, '');
                const line = document.getElementById(`line-${cleanName}`);

                const marker = document.createElement('div');
                marker.className = `marker-diamond`;
                marker.style.left = `${pxPos}px`;
                // Center marker vertically in dynamic row height
                marker.style.top = "50%";
                marker.style.marginTop = "-7px"; // Half of 14px height
                marker.dataset.evtIndex = evtIndex;

                line.appendChild(marker);
            });
        }
    });

    // --- 3. LOGIC ---
    const scroller = document.getElementById('scroller');
    const cinematicBg = document.getElementById('cinematic-bg');

    const mainCard = document.getElementById('main-card');
    const cardImgWrapper = document.getElementById('card-img-wrapper');
    const cardImg = document.getElementById('card-img');
    const cardTitle = document.getElementById('card-title');
    const cardDate = document.getElementById('card-date');
    const cardType = document.getElementById('card-type');
    const cardDesc = document.getElementById('card-desc');

    function updateView() {
        const scrollLeft = scroller.scrollLeft;
        const containerW = scroller.clientWidth;
        const playhead = scrollLeft + (containerW / 2);

        let activeEvent = null;
        let minDistance = Infinity;

        // Detect event
        historyEvents.forEach((evt, idx) => {
            const evtPos = (evt.offset / 100) * timelineWidth;
            const dist = Math.abs(playhead - evtPos);
            // Detection range needs to be tighter on mobile or it jumps too fast
            const range = (window.innerWidth < 768) ? 150 : 350;

            if (dist < range) {
                if (dist < minDistance) {
                    minDistance = dist;
                    activeEvent = evt;
                }
            }
            // Reset labels
            document.getElementById(`wall-label-${idx}`).classList.remove('active');
        });

        // Reset Visuals
        document.querySelectorAll('.state-line').forEach(el => el.classList.remove('active'));
        document.querySelectorAll('[id^="label-"]').forEach(el => {
            el.classList.remove('text-black', 'font-bold', 'bg-red-50/50');
            el.classList.add('text-slate-700');
        });
        document.querySelectorAll('.marker-diamond').forEach(el => el.classList.remove('marker-visible'));

        if (activeEvent) {
            // Label
            const evtIndex = historyEvents.indexOf(activeEvent);
            document.getElementById(`wall-label-${evtIndex}`).classList.add('active');

            // Card Content
            mainCard.classList.add('card-visible'); // Slide up
            cardTitle.innerText = activeEvent.title;
            cardDate.innerText = activeEvent.date;
            cardDesc.innerText = activeEvent.description;
            cardType.innerText = activeEvent.type.toUpperCase();

            // Image Logic (Only Desktop actually sees the wrapper, but logic remains)
            if (activeEvent.type !== 'small') {
                cardImgWrapper.classList.add('has-image');
                cardImg.src = activeEvent.image;
            } else {
                cardImgWrapper.classList.remove('has-image');
            }

            // BG Logic (Large events)
            if (activeEvent.type === 'large') {
                cinematicBg.style.backgroundImage = `url('${activeEvent.bgImage}')`;
                cinematicBg.style.opacity = '1';
            } else {
                cinematicBg.style.opacity = '0';
            }

            // Highlighting
            const isUnion = activeEvent.involved.includes("All");
            if (!isUnion) {
                activeEvent.involved.forEach(name => {
                    const clean = name.replace(/\s/g, '');
                    const line = document.getElementById(`line-${clean}`);
                    if(line) line.classList.add('active');

                    const lbl = document.getElementById(`label-${clean}`);
                    if(lbl) {
                        lbl.classList.remove('text-slate-700');
                        lbl.classList.add('text-black', 'font-bold', 'bg-red-50/50');
                    }

                    const marker = document.getElementById(`line-${clean}`).querySelector(`div[data-evt-index="${evtIndex}"]`);
                    if(marker) marker.classList.add('marker-visible');
                });
            }
        } else {
            mainCard.classList.remove('card-visible'); // Slide down
            cinematicBg.style.opacity = '0';
        }
    }

    scroller.addEventListener('scroll', () => requestAnimationFrame(updateView));
    updateView();
</script>
